alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick, southeastern Harvey and northwestern Butler Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 941 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newton to near Potwin. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Newton, Bel Aire, Towanda, Benton, Whitewater, Kechi, Potwin, Elbing, Northeast Wichita, Newton Airport and Jabara Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 61 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and central Kansas.
